TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler(object sender, CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler(sender As Object, e As CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs)
public delegate void CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: Representa o método que manipula o evento anexado .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the attached events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este delegado deve ser usado pelo manipulador de eventos.This delegate must be used by the event handler. O é um evento anexado, mas ele tem uma estratégia de roteamento direta, o que significa que ele só pode ser processado no objeto onde ele é gerado.The event is an attached event, but it has a direct routing strategy, which means it can only be handled on the object where it is raised.
